results.content: James is an excellent instructor. I learned the fundamentals of netlify serverless functions, auth0 authentication and styled components i'm sure i will use them in my next web2 project.
results.content_html: James is an excellent instructor. I learned the fundamentals of netlify serverless functions, auth0 authentication and styled components i'm sure i will use them in my next web2 project.

results.content: This is the best course I have ever taken on udemy, If you want to strengthen your react knowledge and learn how to utilize serverless function, code along with this course and you will blown away I promise you
results.content_html: This is the best course I have ever taken on udemy, If you want to strengthen your react knowledge and learn how to utilize serverless function, code along with this course and you will blown away I promise you

results.content: Good course!  All exciting topics covered - from CSS/JS to Airtable, Auth0, Netlify quick deployments with serverless functions. Some minor issues with the exercises in the project, but the concepts are clearly explained and one can solve these with a little bit of work/research. James is a good instructor.
results.content_html: Good course! All exciting topics covered - from CSS/JS to Airtable, Auth0, Netlify quick deployments with serverless functions. Some minor issues with the exercises in the project, but the concepts are clearly explained and one can solve these with a little bit of work/research. James is a good instructor.

results.content: Amazing course, covering overall Netlify Functions workflow and Auth0 authentication. A very cool project idea, using modern React without forgetting about styles. Thanks James!
results.content_html: Amazing course, covering overall Netlify Functions workflow and Auth0 authentication. A very cool project idea, using modern React without forgetting about styles. Thanks James!

results.content: very good one, for the serverless function part ?
results.content_html: very good one, for the serverless function part ?

results.content:
This course is top notch. 

James teaches things in a unique non-confusing way. I finally understood Authentication and Authorization all using auth0.  

Login to the front end and securing serverless functions (back end) was also explained. I finally understood all of it.

Would love a more complex course that builds on this one.

Thanks!
results.content_html:
This course is top notch.

James teaches things in a unique non-confusing way. I finally understood Authentication and Authorization all using auth0.

Login to the front end and securing serverless functions (back end) was also explained. I finally understood all of it.

Would love a more complex course that builds on this one.

Thanks!

results.content:
With regard to the content of this course I can only think of one word to summarize my experience and that is . . . AWESOME!!!
As for the teacher I have to say I love this guy and his style of teaching. There is just one thing I have to admit . . . I'm not only completely new to React but also fairly new to JavaScript (I tried some courses here on Udemy but did not get very far because I had some difficulties with the style they were presented and so none completed). So I had a hard time to follow along because this guy is talking very very quick. The first 15 videos I tried to code along with him. But as he was talking at this high speed AND with this enormous enthusiasm which just hypnotized me from that point on I just watched and listened. I just couldn't help doing otherwise!!! I just had to let it continue. And so I finished this course in just three days. And I learned an awesome amount of new things. Unfortunately at this stage I hardly will be able to use it without repeating the whole stuff a second time or maybe even a third time. 
BUT . . . I love to do the whole course again because I got addicted how the content was presented. Very clear and concise. Ok, as I already mentioned this guy should be rewarded with the oscar for speed speaking. On the other hand it was like learning on stereoids for me. I couldn't stop watching and learning new things I never have heard of before. Nevertheless I was able to understand everything James did say . . . AND I'm not a native speaker!!!

results.content: This was a really great class! I learned so much and it was at just the right pace. Highly recommended.

results.content: Well paced.  Hits the high points of the subject well.  Could maybe use to dwell on the "why" and when of using certain approaches.  But, overall, a good introduction to the subject.
